scripts.build: npm run clean && NODE_ENV=production npm run copy && npm run build:js
scripts.clean: rm -rf build/$NODE_ENV && rm -rf node_modules && npm cache verify && npm install --no-optional
scripts.copy: mkdir -p build/$NODE_ENV && cp -r src/index.html src/assets build/$NODE_ENV
scripts.start: npm run copy:dev && NODE_ENV=development webpack-dev-server --progress --colors --hot --config ./webpack.dev.js --mode development
scripts.deploy: NODE_ENV=production && npm run build && npm run deploy:sync && aws configure set preview.cloudfront true && npm run deploy:invalidate
scripts.deploy:sync: aws s3 sync build/production/ s3://sonalysis.net --acl public-read --exclude .DS_Store --delete
